title: Prediction of Listener Perception of Argumentative Speech in a Crowdsourced Dataset Using (Psycho-)Linguistic and Fluency Features
authors: [{"name": "Yu Qiao"}, {"name": "Sourabh Zanwar"}, {"name": "Rishab Bhattacharyya"}, {"name": "Daniel Wiechmann"}, {"name": "Wei Zhou"}, {"name": "Elma Kerz"}, {"name": "Ralf Schlüter"}]

title: MINAR: Mobile Indoor Navigation using Augmented Reality
Exploring an XR Indoor Navigation System for Remote Collaboration
venue: Proceedings of the 30th ACM Symposium on Virtual Reality Software and Technology
description: This poster presents an extended reality remote collaboration system using AR-based indoor navigation for on-site and a BIM-based VR system for remote users. A user study with ten participants (five pairs) provides initial insights into usability and preferences for collaborative tools.
